website_summaries.verdict: This set is a little pricey, but features good quality tools and a fine leather case.
pros: Includes fingernail clippers, toenail clippers, cuticle trimmer, cuticle nipper, ingrown toenail clipper, cuticle pusher, tweezers, scissors, nail file, ear pick, and v-shaped cuticle trimmer
Tools are made out of stainless steel and the case and tools are good quality
cons: The tweezers are a little too thick for use for eyebrows and some of the tools aren't very sharp

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because it looked to be great quality and I use pretty much all of the pieces in this set regularly. I was looking for a stainless steel set in particular. I was greatly disappointed with this set, straight out of the box several pieces are dirty with some black sticky grime substance, two of the pieces including the tweezers have the "real stainless" coating flaking off. Obviously NOT stainless steel! The nail clippers dont cleanly cut the nail, instead tearing as they cut. I couldn't be more dissatisfied with a product considering it's one of the more expensive sets for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality with One Exception
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Bought these as a replacement for a cheap set. Very happy so far, the quality is great, the zipper case is very sturdy and appealing. The only complaint is that the tweezers are thicker than I would like and aren't great for thinner eyebrow hair, etc. Great gift for lady or gentleman.
customer_reviews.author: AjLoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This was a really nice set - (Good quality utensils, machined to make precise cuts). I am impressed that there was a recall on one of the nippers and we were contacted promptly and offered a replacement. Good product good service!
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Colorado - Best Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I've given most items a go and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a set worthy of keeping. Had bought two other sets, one off of Amazon, returned both. One of the previous sets was actually dangerous. This set is a quality item top to bottom, each and every piece of the set, including the case, appears to be well made. I've given most items a go and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: cludwig

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy Manicure Set
customer_reviews.text: Every piece in this kit is high quality. The leather case looks durable and should last a lifetime. It is good to see someone who takes pride in their craft. Think of it this way. At $2 a tool and $2 for a leather case, that is the price for pure quality. The clippers are sharp. I used the eyebrow trimmers to clip some thread on clothes that my scissors could not do with a clean cut. Also, the tool to get rid of hang nails (V-shaped cuticle trimmer) is awesome. Never seen on before, but worked flawlessly. LOVE IT!!! Next year I will be giving out these as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. One tool is dirty the first time I saw it, and the whole set is not sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality for its Price, SOLD!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I was looking for a set that was complete and that would hold up to tough nails! The other sets $12-17, were having reviews that were are not strong enough and clippers "disassemble" themselves. This KIT is a huge thumbs up, or rather 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband to replace his old set. He wanted a good quality stainless set and this fit the bill. Nice leather. The tools themselves are stainless and their finish has a brushed nickle appearance. The clippers all have smooth working mechanisms. I'm very please with my purchase especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING, AMAZON.
customer_reviews.text: The kit that I received was used, complete with greasy finger prints on the outer box, tools not in proper places, and cat hair inside the kit. I did look at the kit though, and for the price, I expect better tools that aren’t dull. Update: I received a new manicure set in the mail without even ordering it. It is also used, and missing both sets of clippers. There is actual grass inside of the kit box....????????
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: the pliers do not cut anything right and several pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: the pliers do not cut anything right and several pieces were broken I do not know why this product was so bad
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Really good set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good manicure set for what it costs. All of the edges of the clippers, nippers, and tweezers are sharp and meet up well. All of the tools feel well made and sturdy. A cool bit I found out was the nail clippers have a different file on them (and it actually looks functional unlike most). The case is not real leather from what I can tell but it’s pretty good quality. The loops hold the tools very well. The zipper is very good and moves very easily. If you get this, whether for yourself or as a gift, the recipient will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Case nipper clasp was fused shut and could not open without tearing the case.
customer_reviews.text: The case nipper clasp would not open. The instrument quality is poor, not sharp. the case is more purple than brown. Familife did not get back to me when I tried to get a replacement using their "Lifetime Guarantee. I guess I waited too long for a response because Amazon said I was 2 days over the return window when I finally called them to complain. I said this return is because the product is defective. Amazon said there is a $5 restocking fee per the company. So much for a Lifetime Guarantee! Amazon said they would give me a $10 gift credit to make me whole which was good on their part.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya D. Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: If I cared for other people’s feet the way I care about mine, I’d have mani/pedi empire. All these pieces are surgical grade out of the package, case is brown with purple interior, and it’s great for travel. I’m not vain or vainglorious but having the right tools to treat your hands and feet well so you don’t get ingrown nails and tweezers for those extra eyebrow connecting hairs. It’s a great value and I gifted this twice and both of those homeless dudes have the fiercest brows and cuticles this side of the Mississippi.
customer_reviews.author: Taeo79

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the fantastic quality of this product. The case feels like quality leather and the zipper is solid and moves easily. ALL tools needed are there, well organized and easy to retrieve. It includes a toenail clipper that can handle even the toughest nails. The two compartments are separated by an attached velvety cloth, protecting the instruments. This case is a real joy to use and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vera A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Needs Some Work. Item missing in Newly Boxed Product
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set, but unfortunately I had to take two stars off. My product arrived brand new, in-box and shrink-wrapped, but it was missing the nail file when opened. This company needs to work on its quality control. It could be a five-star company if it were to put in just a little more effort.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: FAMILIFE LO1 Manicure Set~
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product!! Beautiful packaging and the zippered case is beautiful and has a seperated lining to keep tools from getting markedup. The OVERALL MARKSMENSHIP of this product is SOLID. The blades on clippers and files are smooth yet sharp and easy clip upon pushing down on clippers. SO PLEASED with this purchase and my husband is FINALLY gonna have his own set with perfect storage for his needs! No more hearing - " Honey, wheres the nail clippers at?!!!" lol, Thankyou for listing this product, TOP QUALITY !!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ~ Lisa M.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp at all. Good looking but useless.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not provide any of the described features. Tools are way too far from being sharp and overall very cheap quality. Don't settle for this, because you'll be disappointed and will have to get a decent set from a better quality (and more expensive) brand.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!Best manicure set ever!
customer_reviews.text: This manicure set is fabulous! I bought two of them one for me one for my husband. He has trouble with his toenails and this is really helped is able to clip them now. If I find it incredibly useful and use it almost every day to keep my nails in good order. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kw321

customer_reviews.title: Not for Professional Use
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set. However, they did not come with instructions of how to disinfect tools. Three tools began RUSTING after following on-line procedure to disinfect them. Also, I purchased it to take to my manicurist to use. She said that they can't use it as they are too small and not sharp enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: No cheap materials used here! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: We use this pack daily. We were always losing tweezers and nail clippers. Having in one pouch is very helpful. The zipper pouch is leather and nicely make. No cheap materials here! The tools inside are heavy, and high quality. The clippers are sharp, which is great! Would highly recommend!! Worth the money to have something that is going to last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: The wife seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, if she likes it then I'm happy and I'm one happy man lol. Seriously, the kit works great. I just use the nail clippers and I have no complaints. My wife uses everything else and she's happy. Very convenient to take on trips. Everything fits in the pouch perfectly and you'll know if you left something behind before zipping it closed so definitely good for the forgetful mind. I highly recommend this for men and also for men to buy for their wives. Mine loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.G

customer_reviews.title: Issue at first but resolved quickly.
customer_reviews.text: First time my wife used this tool it broke. It looks nice although I am not sure of the quality since it broke this fast. Uodate*** I gave it 1 star originally although after the review hey contacted me and sent me another one very fast and I have not had any issues yet with the new set. Thank you appreciate the assistance and understanding. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Ordering another one now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my boyfriend to replace his low quality clippers and not only was it exactly what I wanted to get for him but it exceeded my expectations. This is like surgical quality steel, extremely sharp and easy to use (cuts the nail first time, every time). It is so much better than a set I ordered for myself years ago that I am now ordering a set for myself. If you need to buy/upgrade any of these tools do yourself a favor and buy this set, you won't be disappointed. It's also nicely packaged and could be given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave much thought to the purchase of a manicure set. I wanted one of high quality that would last for 40 years as my mother in laws has. I read every review of every set that caught my eye. This set is high quality and it shows as soon as you remove it from its wrappings. The leather is butter soft. The tools are sturdy and appear to be made from high quality stainless steel. There is an instrument for your every need to keep your nails in perfect shape. I highly recommend this item to anyone looking for a set that will last them a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bourbon

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with cheapy nail cutters for years I decided to splurge and get a really good manicure set. I tried this for the first time yesterday and what a difference a good pair of clippers makes! Lots of nice little additional items in this set and all work very well. The case is very nice, too, in a rich "Oxblood" color that feels just like leather and is good quality. Each item has its own little strap to hold them in the case and a pamphlet comes with it to tell the use of each.
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Near-heirloom quality manicure set
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest, best-made manicure sets I've ever owned. The weight of the individual pieces lets you know that it's solid, and are built to last. They have a very good feel in the hand and the set has a great selection of tools. This is the type of set that could easily be gifted. I received my first set as a gift and have since given another as a gift. I look forward to a very long relationship with this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Holzmann

customer_reviews.title: Seem really solid
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. When it came to my home I wasn't sure what it was because the package was way heavier than I expected. It comes in a nice box and a nice travelling case. I have no idea what a lot of the tools are but I will figure them out. I have pretty thick toenails and I had no problem clipping them.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed from the first moment I opened the package. Inside a sturdy box, I found the leather case wrapped in tissue paper. Unzipping the case revealed that the tools on each half were separated and protected by a suede tab, keeping them from scratching the ones on the other side. Each tool was securely held in place by a band, with the nippers secured further by a snap. The tools all feel very well made. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is boxed very professionally and it just keeps getting better as you go from the case to the actual products inside. Extremely impressive quality. Would be a great gift and you can send it with trust that if that is what they want, they will really like it. Have used all of the products and none were anything but well made. No breakage...not understanding the other reviews. This is one of the nicest products I have ever gotten on Amazon! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well made...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed how well made the kit was. I have used all pieces (except ear wax remover which, I feel, should be replaced with a pimple tool or smaller cuticle pusher since nothing should be inserted into the ear). All the pieces weigh and feel good in hand. Clippers clip without much effort and cut is slanted properly. Bought this kit cuz it was stainless steel which is good for sanitizing and positive reviews. Great decision. Will be buying a set for Christmas as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: CinNaRV

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Although I have no use for every item in this case, each piece is nice as I wanted it for travel for work. My wife liked it some much, I had to order a second one JUST for her!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Beware:
customer_reviews.text: My order came with the pods loose in the shipping box. Repacking items like this is against the law. In this day of Coronavirus I had no choice but to to trash the entire order. There went $18 down the drain. I previously ordered from another distributor and it was fine. We're on Stay at Home orders in MD because of the virus so I can't even go out to return the pods. I don't know how this could have been rated as an "Amazon Choice" item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This comes nicely packaged for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this set. I bought it because I wanted a decent manicure set for travelling and home as well. This set fits the bill as all of the tools are very sturdy and sharp. This would also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: g vince

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the burgundy color, the case looks beautiful. Packaging was perfect and item well protected. The case has a leather separator (which is not shown as it is folded under in the picture) that protects the tools from banging against each other. This is a quality product and I would definitely recommend to others. The only thing I wish it had is an instructional cheat sheet so I can know what each tool is for, other than the obvious ones that I know.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn One

customer_reviews.title: A necessary useful nail kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kit for all your nails. It comes in a lovely leather case with all tools needed for hands and feet. Perfect for traveling and at home use!
customer_reviews.author: Puffgw

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review- they are keepers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased set in 2018- it is still in like new condition today and gets regular usage by the men of the household. Convenient- case holds everything in its place, no more searching through drawers and the case has held up two years strong. Quality- each instrument is well made, joints are tight and precise- no lose handles or wimpy thin parts. Clippers feel substantial, you feel in control of them rather than afraid your going to break them or they will twist in your hand. Why am I back after two years- it’s so well made for the price and I am so satisfied that I’m going to buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Funeral Director

customer_reviews.title: The Pouch The Set Comes In Is Very Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the pouch or zippered bag is very cheaply made. The manicure set itself is very nice, sturdy and heavy duty. But, the bag is not. The interior snap broke on the very first use. I bought this set especially, because it had a carrying pouch that my husband could easily store and take out when needed. Now I need to find another "bag or pouch" that will hold the items neatly and seperate as this should have done. I am disappointed in the overall product design and cannot use as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality set. Nice packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The entire set is very high quality. The first thing I noticed was that it was much heavier than I expected. All of the tools have a nice, solid feel to them and everything that is supposed to be sharp is very sharp. The carrying case looks great and feels like it will hold up for a long time. The set came wrapped in tissue in a nice box that could be used to give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Catron

customer_reviews.title: The build quality is great; good weight and machining to the metal components
customer_reviews.text: Was really pleasantly surprised by this. The build quality is great; good weight and machining to the metal components, not too tight and not loose/soft, cutting surfaces nice and sharp. The case appears to be faux and is a deep purple when you stare at it, but passes for brown leather on a casual glance. Definitely not the normal junk pleather stuff that is usually associated to the cheaper sets. Nice assortment of tools and great value considering the sub $25 sale price. Surely feels like it would stand up to time and use. Definitely on par with the more well known brands such as tweezerman. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend to friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceMountain76

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but I had to for this one. Excellent quality and the right amount of tools. You’ll be very happy you got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised... It's a Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer than I expected for the price. Everything works really well and fits nicely into the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great manicure set for a man
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and it's perfect and versatile. You get everything you need in a lovely case too. The quality is excellent of the stainless steel clippers and miscellaneous manicuring set. The case is nice too; very functional.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They work and they are mine. The case is really nice, its not like a cheap gift box you get at the store. So far I have had them for a little bit now and still seem sharp and functional. The one thing I would recommend is to smooth off the edges of the finger and toe nail clippers. They seem to have a sharp 90 degree angle on the shafts that you hold. not super comfy but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jones

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kit. It had everything I needed plus more. It was a really good price for Quality pieces. The little case is more purple or maroon colored, but I like it. The tools are a good weight and they work well. I looked at several different kits before I finally settled on this one and I'm glad this is the one I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Clipper alignment problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my wife and she was thrilled when she opened it. Then she used the clippers and was very disappointed as the tore rather than cut. She had me look at them and I thought they were very sharp, however, the two parts did not align well. Rubbing my finger across the blade side in one direction was smooth but in the other direction the blade snagged my finger. Alignment is poor which causes the tearing.
customer_reviews.author: staleoldpop

customer_reviews.title: Decent product by the clippers are lousy
customer_reviews.text: Good product by the nail clippers are poor, I like all the tools, but the clippers are worse than something you'd get at the grocery store. They are so sharp they leave lots of sharp edges, the don't so much clip as cut, and if you don't have a file you will be getting hangnails constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mani/pedi set
customer_reviews.text: We use this kit all the time. The instruments and case are of very good quality. Good for hands and feet - highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, nice enough to gift a favorite person. Would most definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use on your talons too!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked fantastically. I actually got it to help trim our Parrot's beaks before we sand them down. It works perfectly. It also works wonderfully on both the Conure and the Hahn's Macaw's beaks because the variety of clipper sizes. It has helped trim their talons quickly. They take care of my cuticles and I can file down my nail bits as well. So really we all win no matter the thickness of our nail like protrubrences! I admit there are a few things in the kit I am unsure how to use and will have to you tube later.
customer_reviews.author: Kiviana Firetoad

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Comprehensive set.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has most things you will ever need. I only rate it 4 star for travel because it is so comprehensive that it is a bit heavy and I like to travel light. Quality is very good esp for the price. It is not Solingen Germany level but very good for made in China.
customer_reviews.author: T from Tennessee/Alabama

customer_reviews.title: You can not miss with this Set!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is one of the best i have ever used. Super sharp and all the tools are perfect. Wife loves the kit. It has diamond files on both cutters. the Diagonal cutters are super sharp! This is one of the best kits i have ever seen and used.. very professional and for the price awesome! The leather case is awesome and very well made as much as the tools you get in the kit. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Voodooman

customer_reviews.title: Great set, sharp clippers, good heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: Great manicure kit for guys! I bought for myself, and super impressed. All tools made of goid, heavy weight stainless, won't bend. Clippers are EXTREMELY sharp, and appears to be maintaining their edge after about 4 months of use. Carry case is nice too. Bought set eacj for brother and nephew. They love their kits! No hunting for clippers!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, check air travel restrictions before packing. Very sleek and classy. All items are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for a travel case to replace the old one we lost. This has worked wonderfully and is very well made. Even the clippers have little files in the handles.
customer_reviews.author: A Small Change

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nail kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful kit. The case is very well made and holds all the instruments you need to do your nails. It is also packaged nicely and would make a great gift. I used it only a few times, but am very pleased so far. Deducting one star because cuticle nippers are not sharp. Other tools work great.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality set, great gift
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality item. Great presentation from the box to the leather holder. This is something you just don't buy for yourself, for that reason alone it makes a great gift! Think going off to college or moving out on their own or just friend to frined. I agree with another reviewer, it would be nice to have an instruction card....what each tool is designed for. Very impressive. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Barb in MI

customer_reviews.title: A good quality set that can last
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality grooming tools that look solid and durable. I tried a couple of tools like scissors, clippers, nail pusher and they work all very well. They come with a nice leather pouch so it'd be good for a gift too. I'm glad I decided to spend $10 more and bought something that can last long.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A ok pack...
customer_reviews.text: Nice combo but the clippers aren't very sharp, especially the cuticle nipper.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item to my son to keep in his dorm room. It has everything he will need for his nails.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great quality
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I was surprised by the weight of the product. Once opened, I understood why. Each item in the case is solid stainless steel and well made. I have not needed to use every implement within, but I have used several. Each item is sharp and easy to use. Very effective. I would highly recommend this item for anyone needing a quality manicure set.
customer_reviews.author: Clay, Houston TX

customer_reviews.title: Manicure set
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my grandson for Christmas. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine G.

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER IMPRESSED by the quality of this kit!!! I’ve bought 4 so fat and still want to buy more as gifts! This is an amazing deal for the quality and quantity of tools in comes with! I love the travel case in comes in too! Makes storage and clean up so easy!
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. I have been a nail biter all my life and recently kicked the habit, but a lot of damage was done. This kit has helped me fix some of the damage I had done and allow my now growing nails to look healthier. Good quality and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jmcgouldrick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality of this set. It exceeded my expectations. I think I will buy more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: B. ANDREWS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality. Cheap Material.
customer_reviews.text: Not ergonomic. Nail clippers are so cheap quality. Cuts very badly. Waste of money. I had betters before for cheaper prices.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I hate spending money on this kind of stuff so when I found this set for around 20 bucks I was pretty pleased. All tools are super sharp and my fiancé said the tweezers I gave her from it are the best set she's ever used. I also enjoy the nice leather pouch/organizer they come with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple but exclusive pedicure set
customer_reviews.text: It has high-quality material and looks so exclusive with the nice box casing.
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a nice case...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one of these manicure sets for my husband and was very happy with the purchase. He loves it! And then I was jealous...I needed one for myself. It has everything you need in a nice organized case. So I bought one for myself plus 5 more for each of our grown kids and their spouses ...great stocking stuffers! I highly recommend! Great quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: TinaC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and durability. Small and easily packed. Everything is secured down and right where you left it when you open it up again.
customer_reviews.author: A.J

customer_reviews.title: i bought a great set 12 years ago
customer_reviews.text: i bought a great set 12 years ago, since then I have been in the search for the best set again.... This is by far the nicest set I have ever seen! the leather the quality of the metal.... just all in all a great set! All of it says adult, and professional!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this quality set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents for Christmas and to my delight it was a very very very nice set and I highly recommend it for people with thick nails and toe nails.
customer_reviews.author: Katstpat

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, as advertised.  Nice enough for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the set comes with a heavy-duty travel case. The various instruments are nicely designed, substantial, and sharp. I've had mine for several months now. Definitely would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: FeedBackShop

customer_reviews.title: Manicure set
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the kit is organized. The excellent quality of the items make it a perfect gift giving option.
customer_reviews.author: KJean

customer_reviews.title: The set arrived on schedule securely wrapped. The set ...
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived on schedule securely wrapped. The set is very comprehensive with the tools one would need to carry out a professional manicure. I am impressed by the weight and solid feel the pieces have in the hand, making them feel expensive, professional and effective. I look forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Case is outstanding. Very nice finish and function on product. This is a great buy and price is very cheap for everything in the kit. Very happy, will purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to give away as a gift in a game. The person that won it was very impressed by it and so was I. Looks well made and has everything you need. Everyone wanted one. I will be ordering myself one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice manicure set. I got this for myself and the quality of the tools surprised me. The case is even a decent quality. This has really helped me better my home manicures.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best damned manicure kit I've every owned. Does the job, very well made and works with precision. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mav2Knight

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Clippers
customer_reviews.text: These are far superior to every other nail clipper I've ever owned. This is the first time in my life that I didn't just buy whatever is on the rack at the local department store. The difference in quality is huge. Both clippers are stellar performers. I haven't used any of the other kit pieces.
customer_reviews.author: robert t ashbaugh

customer_reviews.title: The best set yet!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy every tool in this set. The quality is just what I was looking for. The case is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Manicure Set
customer_reviews.text: Every men and women needs this product! I have used all the tools that come included in this kit and I am very pleased with how my hands look and feel. It's small enough to throw in a purse, backpack, suitcase or hygiene bag. The tools are built very sturdy and not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rangel

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our travels to Florida. Very well made, pieces are strong and look expensive. Heavy duty. Case is leather and looked rich.
customer_reviews.author: deby lopa

customer_reviews.title: Lighten up!
customer_reviews.text: I would like a different colored container. More feminine would be my choice. Thanks for asking.
customer_reviews.author: the gardener

customer_reviews.title: All in one package!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old package (about 10 years) that went lost along with my luggage in NYC airport a few months back. I like this one for a variety of features and compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin J Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Really, really nice product. I actually use this, which I knew I wouldn't do if I did not like the quality. The case makes me feel like I'm using professional tools. The tools themselves are perfect for what I needed. Really love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality in person. Sturdy case and the zipper slides very easily. Gifted to my husband on Christmas and he thought it was very luxurious haha
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Great nail kit
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter each got one and they both love them.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Green

customer_reviews.title: Manicure Set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools. They are well built. The case is tight. Needs some work there.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I could like a kit as much as I do this one. The case is soft and feels great. And each tool is incredible. For the price this is all incredible. I honestly never thought I'd see myself writing a review for a manicure set. That's how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Item long time ago now I bought for my grand
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy works great nice case easy to carry on Love it
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Zaga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is by far one of the best quality set I have ever owned well worth the price many times over this is a fabulous gift to give to anyone I am very pleased with this set this is one of those things you have her lifetime and then pass it on
customer_reviews.author: Christine K.

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set so I could trim a family member’s toenails. The clippers are not adequate for clipping thick old people toenails. The rest of the tools are great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is really nice. The case is nice and the tools inside are sturdy. I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cuticle trimmer immediately broke, no replacement issued (yet!)
customer_reviews.text: The cuticle cutter resistance band broke as soon as I used. Otherwise high-quality but can't recommend something that breaks on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great nail implements for the price. Durable and easy to store in luggage or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Litsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice tools and storage case
customer_reviews.text: Really nice manicure set especially for the price. Love that it has the nice storage case and everything you can possibly need for mani/pedi, good quality tools. Don't hesitate buying this set, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taynuh12

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality grooming set. Concerned the low price would reflect the workmanship, just the opposite, it’s worth three times what I paid. I will buy several more for my siblings Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Real steel
customer_reviews.text: The product is high quality for the most part except for the chip exposing the steel center it came with and the cheep leather used for the flap. But all and all a good product for the price. Also put a few pictures explaining how to use the tools. But they are easy to use and good for traveling. Pretty giftable too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Case is hard to get things in and out of...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what half the items do, but they are pretty well made. For the price...well worth it. Pieces don’t fit well in the case and can be hard to get in and out. Overall satisfied and would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Clippers didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: A nice fully stocked kit but the nail clippers were difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

product_meta.title: FAMILIFE L01 11 in 1 Stainless Steel Manicure Set with Box
feature_bullets: ❤Multipurpose Grooming Kit: FAMILIFE is a brand that has specialized in many kinds of beauty tools for many years, this manicure set is 11 in 1, multifunction professional pedicure set meets everything you need, include hand care, facial care, and foot care.

❤Luxury Unique Gift Set-YOU CAN’T FIND ANY SIMILAR PRODUCT LIKE US IN MARKET: Do you want to give a unique and excellent quality gift to give a surprise for your family and friends? Not only our quality, but also its design is also distinctive with others, this manicure pedicure set is made of 100% heavy-duty stainless steel, never rusts, and it comes with a magnificent gift box package, looks rich and royal, so it's the best gift for valentine's day, birthday, anniversary, Christmas, marriage

❤Content: 11 pcs of manicure pedicure set, including 1x Fingernail Clippers, 1x Toenail Clippers, 1x Cuticle Nippers, 1x Ingrown Toenail Clippers, 1x Cuticle Trimmer, 1x Cuticle & Nail Polish Pusher, 1x Tweezers, 1x Scissor, 1x Nail File, 1x Ear Pick, 1x V-Shaped Cuticle Trimmer

❤Travel Portable Leather Case: Do you want to own a travel manicure set which doesn’t occupy space when you travel or at home? it is designed with portable size, so it is very convenient to carry, can fit into almost any handbags/shoulder bags, great for travel or at home

❤How to maintain grooming kit and keep a good nail care habit: Put the manicure set back to the package and in a dry environment when don’t use. Good maintenance, the blade will be still sharp and don’t rust after several years. For health, It is better to use your own nail care kit separately as separate tools for fingers and toes to keep a good care habit
